summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated February 19, 2011. The email expresses an apology for typos and indicates that Epstein attempted to call Staley. The context suggests a personal or professional communication between the two individuals.

persons.name: Jes Staley

Jeffrey Epstein attempted to call Jes Staley.
The email contains an apology for typos, indicating a casual tone.
